special_powers.name: GALE-FORCE BREATH
special_powers.description: Superman can use Force Blast. When he does, he may target an adjacent character and up to two characters that are adjacent to that character. After actions resolve, give the targeted character(s) an action token if they have zero action tokens.

special_powers.name: HELPING PEOPLE IS WHAT I DO
special_powers.description: Superman can use Impervious. When a friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire takes damage from an opponent's attack, after actions resolve you may place Superman and that character in each other's squares. This power can't be countered by characters less than 100 points.

special_powers.name: DROP IN FROM THE ROOF
special_powers.description: Batman can use Leap/Climb.

special_powers.name: TEMPERED AND TRAINED
special_powers.description: Batman can use Toughness and Combat Reflexes.

special_powers.name: LASSO OF TRUTH
special_powers.description: Give Wonder Woman a power action. Wonder Woman may make a ranged combat attack that deals no damage as if she had a range value of 4. Give a hit character an action token and counter all speed and damage powers a hit character possesses until your next turn.

special_powers.name: INEFFECTIVE AGAINST YELLOW
special_powers.description: Green Lantern modifies his attack and damage values by -1 when attacking a character displaying a yellow power in their dial.

special_powers.name: GREEN CONSTRUCTS
special_powers.description: Green Lantern can use Barrier, Incapacitate, and Telekinesis.

special_powers.name: DEFENDING MERA
special_powers.description: If Aquaman occupies water terrain at the beginning of an action, he modifies his speed value by +2.  If a friendly character named Mera has been KO'd this game, modify Aquaman's combat values by +1.

special_powers.name: ELECTRONIC EYE
special_powers.description: Cyborg ignores other characters' Stealth.

special_powers.name: BEST SHOT IN THE BIZ
special_powers.description: Green Arrow modifies his attack value by +2 when targeting a single character within 5 squares with a ranged combat attack.

special_powers.name: FLURRY... OF ARROWS
special_powers.description: Give Green Arrow a ranged combat action targeting a single character. After the ranged combat attack resolves, he may make a second ranged combat attack as a free action targeting one other character.

special_powers.name: SORCERESS OF THE DEEP
special_powers.description: Mera may target opposing characters within 6 squares that occupy or are adjacent to water terrain with close combat attacks.

special_powers.name: AQUAKINESIS
special_powers.description: Mera can use Telekinesis. If Mera uses Telekinesis to place an opposing character that currently occupies water terrain, modify her attack value by +3.

special_powers.name: MERGE
special_powers.description: If this character is adjacent to JL52 #010 Firestorm and neither have an action token, you may give this character a free action to replace both characters with JL52 #021 Fury. Fury begins on the same click number as this character and cannot use the Split ability this turn.

special_powers.name: DISABLE YOUR WEAPONRY
special_powers.description: Firestorm can use Probability Control once per turn when he is attacked. When he does, if the rerolled attack is a critical hit, he may use Probability Control one more time.

special_powers.name: MERGE
special_powers.description: If this character is adjacent to JL52 #009 Firestorm and neither have an action token, you may give this character a free action to replace both characters with JL52 #021 Fury. Fury begins on the same click number as this character and cannot use the Split ability this turn.

special_powers.name: DIVE BOMB
special_powers.description: Hawkman can use Charge.  When Hawkman uses Charge, modify his attack and damage values by +1 if he makes an attack targeting a character at a lower elevation than the square in which Hawkman began his movement.

special_powers.name: JOIN ME IN MY MADNESS
special_powers.description: Shade the Changing Man can use Perplex and Shape Change.

special_powers.name: M-VEST
special_powers.description: Shade the Changing Man can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Toughness.

special_powers.name: GHOST
special_powers.description: Deadman can use Phasing/Teleport. He can't be carried and he can't be placed by Telekinesis. Damage dealt to Deadman by close combat attacks is reduced to 1.

special_powers.name: RAELC DNIM
special_powers.description: Give Zatanna a power action, or a free action if she has no action tokens, and choose another friendly character within 4 squares and line of fire.  That character can't be affected by Outwit or Perplex until your next turn.

special_powers.name: TIME SLIDE
special_powers.description: Mindwarp can use Super Senses. Once per turn when Mindwarp has no action tokens, if he can draw line of fire to both the target of an attack and the attacker, the target may use Super Senses if it's a friendly character. If the target evades the attack by this use of Super Senses, place Mindwarp in a square adjacent to the target.

special_powers.name: DEFEATING THE JUSTICE LEAGUE
special_powers.description: (250 points) Enchantress modifies her attack and damage values by +1 when attacking a character with the Justice League keyword.

special_powers.name: STORM OF WITCHES' TEETH
special_powers.description: Enchantress can use Poison and Quake. When she uses either one, all squares with a range of 2 squares and line of fire are considered adjacent and damage dealt cannot be reduced below 1.

special_powers.name: A FORCE NOT TO BE TRIFLED WITH
special_powers.description: Enchantress can use Invulnerability and Willpower.

special_powers.name: THE SPEEDFORCE
special_powers.description: The Flash can use Hypersonic Speed. He may use it normally, or instead his damage value becomes 1 and is locked. If you do, he may make up to 3 close combat attacks instead of 1 against different opposing characters during his move; The Flash may continue moving between attacks.

special_powers.name: YOO HOO... OVER HERE
special_powers.description: The Flash can use Super Senses. When The Flash evades an attack using Super Senses you may immediately move him 1 square.

special_powers.name: FORTUNE TELLING
special_powers.description: Give Madame Xanadu a power action and choose an adjacent character.  When that character misses with an attack this turn, after actions resolve you may remove one action token from that character.

special_powers.name: RIDING THE SYNCHRONICITY HIGHWAY
special_powers.description: John Constantine is a wild card.

special_powers.name: MYSTICAL WARDS
special_powers.description: Other characters can't use Probability Control.

special_powers.name: SHEER CUNNING
special_powers.description: John Constantine can use Outwit and Perplex.

special_powers.name: PRECISELY-TIMED STRIKE
special_powers.description: Deathstroke can use Blades/Claws/Fangs.  After any action resolves, if during that action an opposing character moved into a square adjacent to Deathstroke roll a d6 and deal that character damage equal to the result.

special_powers.name: SPLIT
special_powers.description: Give this character a power action if it has no action tokens and replace it with Firestorm JL52 #009 and Firestorm JL52 #010. Each replacement character is assigned an action token and can't be given an action this turn. They each begin a number of clicks from their starting line equal to the click number.

special_powers.name: RELEASE ENERGY
special_powers.description: Fury can use Pulse Wave and Poison.

special_powers.name: ABSORB ENERGY
special_powers.description: Fury can use Invulnerability. If Fury possesses this power after an action resolves in which he took damage from a ranged combat attack, heal Fury of 1 damage.
